channel.title: Death emote - 317 ( My first post :p , I really could use some help )
channel.description:
Hello, I yesterday started with making my own private server, i want it do be a nice 474 pk server :) So I have a question about the death emote on my server. If u die, a NPC shows up beside u and says GF. How do i delete this NPC? So u just die and u don't have NPC saying GF? PS : I'm using the Boxingscape Client and source. :)
Thx, Xaryza

item.title: Death emote - 317 ( My first post :p , I really could use some help )
item.dc:creator: @Xaryza Xaryza
item.description:
@Xaryza wrote:

I did what u told me to do, compiled it. And the NPC is still there. :s

Read full topic
item.source: Death emote - 317 ( My first post :p , I really could use some help )

item.title: Death emote - 317 ( My first post :p , I really could use some help )
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

search the NPC name in npc.cfg and it will give you his npc ID, search for that in client.java and where you see the death method it should be there, delete the npc & his message from there, really easy

Read full topic
item.source: Death emote - 317 ( My first post :p , I really could use some help )
